cta.title: Questions or collaboration ideas?
cta.description: I would love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about my work, have collaboration ideas, or are interested in connecting, don't hesitate to reach out.

hero.tagline: Inspire Emotion and Evoke Storytelling through the Art of Photography.
hero.description: Explore my photography portfolio and see the world through my creative lens. Contact me if you would like to connect.
